page.title: 06Hobbies
page.content: Most people in our area follow at least one hobby.Some like sports others like collecting.People who like sports like running,throwing,rounders,gym and highjump.People who like collecting collect rubbers,keyrings and things like that.Some people do sports as hobbies such as gym,swimming,horse riding,dancing and also tennis.Some people like playing musical instruments. Some children go to Brownies,Guides,Cubs and Scouts.Here are some hobbies that people like in our class.Tennis-8, horse riding-8,table tennis-8,dancing-7 swimming-5,rounders-9,football-9,crick- et-5,volleyball-6,badminton-10,golf-4, shooting-4,Guides-3,Scouts-3,art-2 and computers-5.Also some people like mak- ing models such as areoplanes.
